Description: One or more of your finger-bones tells your tale in the ivory walls of Scrimshander. Nothing a stuffed glove can't conceal.
LevelDescriptionText: 1|You have sacrificed one of your fingers to Scrimshander.~2|Some of your fingers now decorate the city of Scrimshander.~4|You've given Scrimshander a handful of your fingers.
ChangeDescriptionText: 1|You've added a finger to the bones of Scrimshander~4|You've added a handful of fingers to the bones of Scrimshander
Name: Scrimshander: Missing Finger
